name: Real RC Flight Sim 2016 Free
description:
RC Flight Simulator now for mobiles! Be amazed by the realism and controls of the Remote Control Flight Simulator 2016!

You will fly with 15 different aircrafts in more than 14 high detailed scenarios! We included the virtual RC Controller on the screen fully configurable and a physics algorithm very close to what you can do with your real RC plane.

MAIN FEATURES:
- 15 airplanes (trainers, WWII, Fighter Jets and commercial Jets)
- Arbus 380 neo Emarites
- Boing 747 8i Lifthanza
- Aileron Trainer
- Estra 360 RC
- Cezna 172
- Cezna 182
- Corair FU41 WW2
- Corair FU41 (after WW2)
- Fighter 14
- Fighter 15
- Fighter 22
- Foker Dreidcke 1
- Richtofe Red Baron War 1
- Spitfire Super World War 2
- Zero A6 Mitshu

- 14 scenarios, in different countries, like USA, Germany and more!
- Maneuver checks in real time
- 150 missions
- Different Maneuver difficulty levels.
- Air Gates, Balloons, Rings as mission objectives
- Checks in real time for these Maneuvers:
- Loops
- Inverted Loops
- Cuban Eight
- Half-Cuban
- Immelmann turn
- Aileron Roll
- Barrel Roll

- EXTRA FEATURES:
- Track missions, with a combination of Maneuvers and Air Gates, improving this Flight Simulator challenges.
- Special controls for jet wings, Corsair wings (fold and unfold wings) on RC controller.
- Rating of maneuver during flight.

Feel free to contact us at FlyWings Studios to give your feedback, have a nice RC flight!

Credits:
Photo scenes by Harald Bendschneider
